_{be36_67_1}_: First Single Ingot Roll: Guan Yinping guaranteed.
_{be36_67_2}_: Normal Roll: 1 Epic Warrior guaranteed out of 10 Ingot Roll.
_{be36_67_3}_: Ingot Roll before Level 30: Legendary Warrior is possible.
_{be36_67_4}_: 20 Ingot Roll Guaranteed before Level 30: Legendary Warrior is certain.
_{be36_67_5}_: Ingot Roll after Level 30: Legendary Warrior is possible, and low probability of Divine Warrior.
_{be36_67_6}_: 20 Ingot Roll guarantee after Level 30: Legendary Warrior guaranteed and low probability of Divine Warrior.
